product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone – Pink
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: Lightning. Model Name: AirPods Max. Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Wired. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth, NFC. Age Range (Description): Adult. Material: memory foam. Specific Uses For Product: Music. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling, Recording, Exercising, Gaming, Disc Jockey Use. Compatible Devices: Cellphones, Tablets, Telephones, Music Production Equipment, Laptops, Desktops. Theme: TV Series. Control Type: Call Control, Media Control, Volume Control, Voice Control, Noise Control. Cable Feature: Detachable. Item Weight: 13.6 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Style: Lightning. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Battery Life: 20 Hour. Product Dimensions: 9.43 x 9.57 x 3.15 inches. Language: English, English, English, English, English. Batteries: 2 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included).

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and energetic design targeted at a tech-savvy audience. It is split vertically, with the left half showcasing vibrant layered text compositions and the right half reserved for a large, high-resolution product image. The background uses a gradient from bright red to soft pink with circular accent shapes, adding a dynamic visual style. Key text elements include a large bold call-to-action headline ("heading_1" and "heading_2"), an enthusiastic tagline ("tagline"), a product title and features section ("subheading" and "description"), pricing ("price"), additional promotional copy ("promotional_text"), and a call-to-action button ("cta" on top of "cta_background"). Each layer is thoughtfully spaced and aligned to maintain balance and clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Bright Red: #FF3B3B
- Soft Pink: #FF9797
- Warm Accent (Dark Red): #772424
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product features a warm and vibrant color palette, blending various shades of red and pink with highlights of metallic rose. The headband showcases a bold coral red (#EA4C45), drawing immediate attention, while the ear cushions blend coral pink (#F7837F) with a mesh texture for added depth. The ear cups have a sleek, metallic rose gold finish (#D98C8C), adding a luxurious and modern touch. Silver accents (#C0C0C0) are used subtly on the hinges, providing contrast and elegance. Together, these colors blend seamlessly yet stand out individually, creating a visually appealing balance ideal for a lively, stylish advertisement banner design.
